GK16visa02cu:4: (lo, a) samprati kāvyalakṣaṇayorvākyarasayoḥ svarūpajijñāsāyāṃ prathamoddiṣṭaṃ vākyaṃ
GK16visa02cu:5: dvitīyaparicchedena saparikaraṃ nirūpayitukāmaḥ tat sāmānyatakṣaṇapratipādikāṃ kārikāmavatārayati--vākyasvarūpamiti /
GK16visa02cu:11: padoccayasyaitadabhāve 'pi vākyatve “vahninā siñciti” ityādyapi vākyaṃ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:14: (vi, ka) vākyaṃ rasātmakaṃ kāvyamityuktatvāt vākyalakṣaṇaṃ vaktumāha---vākyasvarūpamiti /
GK16visa02cu:29: tena gauraśva ityādau daivādaśveti jijñāsāsattve 'pi nākāṅkṣā /
GK16visa02cu:30: caitrasya bhrātā gṛhaṃ gacchatītyādau caitrasya na gṛhe ākāṅkṣā udeti bhrātari janitānvayabodhāt /
GK16visa02cu:33: vimalajale 'nvitāyā api nadyāḥ kacchasya sambandhikatvenopasthiteḥ nadīrūpe sambandhini tātparyyaśāt kacchānvayārthamapi kacche jijñāsa udeti iti na tatrāvyāptiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:34: vahninā siñcatītyatra tu karaṇatāyāḥ kāryaṃ vitā anupapattyā seke tat kāryye udeti eva ākāṅkṣā iti bodhyam /
GK16visa02cu:36: anyathā anākāṅkṣitasya kālikasambandhasya vahnikaraṇatāsekayorapi sattvād yogyatā syāt /
GK16visa02cu:43: etadabhāve yogyatāyā abhāve 'pi gaurityādīnāṃ parasparamākāṅkṣāvirahiṇāṃ padānāṃ pratītiparyyavasānaviraha ityeva viśādayatiśroturjijñāsā iti
GK16visa02cu:46: etadabhāvāt gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītyatra ca nānvayabodhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:50: iti vākyam ekadā anvayabodhejanite na anvayabodhāntarajanakam (kā-pra-ṭīdṛviśvanātha) /
GK16visa02cu:53: kevalaṃ kriyāśravaṇe bodhābhāvocca kārakasya (prathamaṃ karttuḥ tataḥ karmaprabhṛtīnāṃ)
GK16visa02cu:56: nirākāṅkṣasya vākyatve “gauraśvaḥ puruṣo istī” ityādīnāmapa vākyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:60: atra cākāṅkṣābhāvādeva ākāṅkṣitasambandhe bādhaviraharūpā yogyataiva nāsti;
GK16visa02cu:66: buddhivicchede 'pi vākyatve idānīmuccāritasya devadattaśabdasya dinātnaro ccāritena gacchatīti padena saṅgatiḥ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:69: (vi, gha) āsattilakṣaṇamāha--yat padabuvdyavyavadhānena yat padabuddhistenaiva saha tasyāsattirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:73: nirarthakena vyavadhāne tu astyevā'sattiḥ--yathā“sa vai gacchati“ityatra vaikārastu nirarthako 'pi prāmāṇikaprayukta eva bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:80: tatrāsattyabhāvaṃ darśayati--buddhivicchede 'pīti--naca tatra pūrvoccāritapadārthasmṛtiryadyasti tadeṣvata eva tatra vākyatvaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:82: śabdabodhajanakatvasyāsattilakṣaṇe 'praveśena tatpadasmṛtyabhāvena śābdabodhājanakatayā vākye tatrātivyāptipradarśanasya aucityādeva /
GK16visa02cu:87: (vi, ṅa) nanu bādhajñānābhāvarūpāyā yogyatāyā jijñāsārūpāyā ākāṅkṣāyāścātmārthavṛttitvāt
GK16visa02cu:88: kathaṃ padoccayasya tadyuktatvam ityata āha--ākāṅkṣāyogyatayoriti---upacāro viṣayatāsambandhena vṛttiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:89: sā ca bādhavirahasya pratiyogino bāghajñānasya viṣaye padoccaye tad viṣayatā sākṣādeva /
GK16visa02cu:104: saṃhatya sametya vākyamahāvākyayorityādiṣu pratyekaṃ vyavaccheda ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:107: anekavākyāni ca saṃhatya samuditārthabodhānārtham itaravākyasāpekṣāṇi prabandheṣu prasiddhani /
GK16visa02cu:108: tathābhūtānāṃ hi padānāṃ vākyānāṃ ca viśakalitānekārthabodhana eva bhaṭṭamate sāmarthyaṃ natvekārthabodhane /
GK16visa02cu:115: dvayorapi lakṣaṇakathane ākāṅkṣāsattvāt mahāvākyalakṣaṇe 'pi yogyatādikaṃ viśeṣaṇamityāha---yogyatākāṅkṣeti /
GK16visa02cu:116: tatrārdrakāṣṭhe vahnirjvalati tena siñcitītyatra mahāvākyatvāpattyā tadvāraṇāya yogyatāyāḥ,
GK16visa02cu:121: sūnyaṃ vāsagṛhamityādi---atra sarvapadārthānāmeva uttaratra sākāṅkṣatvena kasyāpi svārthabodhasamāptyabhāvāt na mahāvākyatvam /
GK16visa02cu:135: na trividhā surā ityatra ekasurāśabdasya gauḍīpaiṣṭhīmādhvītrayabodhakatvāttatrāvyāptiriti vācyam,
GK16visa02cu:136: tatra gauḍī surā paiṣṭhī surāmādhvī surā ityevamāvṛttyaivānvayabodhasvīkaraṇe surāpadatrayasya svasamasaṃkhyārthabodhakatvenāvyaptyabhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:137: na ca taitra-maitra-devadattāḥ sundarā ityatra ekasundarapadena sundaratritayābodhanāt tatrāvyāptiriti vācyam;
GK16visa02cu:139: na ca tathāpi trividhā surā ityatrāvyāptiriti vācyam arthatāvacchedakānekatve āvṛttereva svīkārāt /
GK16visa02cu:156: atra ca vākyasyāśvitānekārthabodhakatvādekārthabodhakatvenaiva tadvāraṇasambhave 'pi tad viśeṣaṇadānamanvitābhidhānavādo 'smabhirnādriyate ityabhiprayasūcanāyaiva ityavadheyam /
GK16visa02cu:161: (vi, ña) sākāṅkṣāneketi---sākāṅkṣāni anekāni padāni yatra tādṛśavākyānāṃ vyavaccheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:177: tathā ca prayogārhapadādeva nirarthaka-ka-ca-ṭa-ta-pādīnāṃ vāraṇaṃ sāyaditi cet, satyam /
GK16visa02cu:179: tataśca tadanupādāne vākyamahāvākyayorativyāptyāpattyā tadvāraṇāyānanvitetyasya dānāvaśmyabhāve tadanurodhena tadviśeṣasyārthasya bodhakatvamupādeyam
GK16visa02cu:184: bahuvacanamavivakṣitaṃ tenaikasya varṇāsya dvayorapi ca parigrahaḥ evaṃ ca mayi sānugraho bhavetyatra akārasya ekavarṇasya vāsudevasambandhoktasya na padatvahāniḥ /
GK16visa02cu:187: artho vācyaśva lakṣyaśca vyaṅgyaśceti tridhā mataḥ // VisSd_2.2 //
GK16visa02cu:190: vyaṅgyo vyañjanayā tāḥ syustistraḥ śabdasya śaktayaḥ // VisSd_2.3 //
GK16visa02cu:197: (lo, u) tatrābhihitānvayavādināṃ mate vākyārtho 'pi padabhidheya iti vakṣyeta /
GK16visa02cu:201: ye cānvitādayo lakṣye vākyārthe iti ūcuḥ tanmate tatparyyavṛttireva vākyārthabodhikā,
GK16visa02cu:203: nanu tatra gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau taṭārthabodhikā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā vṛttiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:206: vyañjanāprastāve lakṣaṇāprastāve tu bhaṭṭamate “sā vṛttirvyañjanā nāma śabdasyārthādikasya ca';
GK16visa02cu:214: abhidheti abhidhīyate bodhyate iti yogārtha eva lakṣaṇam;
GK16visa02cu:215: tatra kasyārthasya bodhanāttādṛśo yogārtha ityatrāha saṃketiteti /
GK16visa02cu:220: evaṃ cāgṛhītavṛttikārthabodhikā vyañjanā kathaṃ vāriteti vācyam /
GK16visa02cu:223: lakṣaṇā tu śaktigrahottaraṃ bādhāvatāre satyeva gṛhyate /
GK16visa02cu:230: uttamavṛddhena madhyamavṛddhamuddiśya “gāmānaya” ityukte taṃ gavānayanapravṛttamupalabhya bālo 'sya vākyasya “sāsnādimatpiṇḍānayanamarthaḥ” iti prathamaṃ pratipadyate,
GK16visa02cu:231: anantaraṃ ca “gāṃ badhāna” “aśvamānaya” ityādāvāvāpodvāpābhyāṃ gośabdasya “sāsnādimānarthaḥ” ānayanapadasya ca “āharaṇamarthaḥ” iti saṃketamavadhārayati
GK16visa02cu:249: (lo, ū) krameṇābhidhādīnāṃ svarūpamāha-tatrapi etat kārikārthamanvitābhidhānaayamarthaḥ-śabdatadarthayorvācyavācakatve vyutpannānāmeva vākyārthapratītiḥ,
GK16visa02cu:254: nanu tarhi vākyabhāgarūpeṣu padeṣu padārthabodhavyatirekeṇa bhinnavākyaniṣṭeṣu padeṣu kathamarthāvabodha ityata āha---anantaraṃ ceti /
GK16visa02cu:257: tathāpi yasya padarūpasya vākyabhāgasya bodhe yasyārthabhāgasyāvāpaḥ,
GK16visa02cu:258: yaduddhāre coddhārastasmen padārthe tasya padasya śaktirāvāpoddharadarśanenaivānugṛhītatayār'thāpattyāvagamyata iti /
GK16visa02cu:259: evaṃ cātra pakṣe pratyayānumānārthāpattibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ saṃketagraha iti sūcitam /
GK16visa02cu:270: anumiti śarīraṃ ca-yeyaṃ prayojya vṛddhasya pravṛttiḥ sā etadanuguṇabuddhi pūrvikā;
GK16visa02cu:276: śaktiṃ vācakavācyatvarūpaṃ sambandham anyathānupapattyā arthāt prayojakavṛddhapravṛtterjānāti /
GK16visa02cu:278: sāvācyā durupapādyeti śabdavyavahārecchede ityata āha--arthāpattyā ca iti /
GK16visa02cu:279: atra cakāreṇa bodhe tu śaktiṃ dūyātmikāmityasyā parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:280: avabudhyate iti pāṭhe tvarthata eva tat parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:282: gṛhītasaṃketavākyabhāgarūpasya tadarthadvayātmikāṃ śaktiṃ vācyavācakasambaddhām avāpoddhāradarśanānugṛhītatayā arthāpattyā jānātīti /
GK16visa02cu:294: yadāhuḥ--“sādṛśyaṃ dharmamātraṃ ca vaisādṛśyaṃ ca bhedataḥ“iti;
GK16visa02cu:299: pūrvāvadhāritasaṃketatayā prasiddhaiḥ padaiḥ samabhivyāhārat madhukarapadārtho bhramara
GK16visa02cu:302: tena gosadṛśo gavayaḥ kākavisadṛśaḥ kokila ityanayorupamānapramāṇena saṅketagrahaḥ sūcitaḥ kvacit śabdapramāṇa ityata āha---kvaciditi /
GK16visa02cu:307: taṃ ca saṅketitamarthaṃ bodhayantī śabdasya śaktyantarānantaritā
GK16visa02cu:316: agrimetyanena yannāmā yatra caitrādiḥ tannāmāviṣayatayāpi sa ityuktaprakārādāśrita caitretyādinānnā viṣayoderiva sāntarāyasaṃketitādvaitalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam /
GK16visa02cu:322: prabhinneti-- atra madhupadaṃ pibatipadaṃ ca prasiddham /
GK16visa02cu:328: saṅketo gṛhyate jātau guṇadravyakriyāsu ca // VisSd_2.4 //
GK16visa02cu:331: śuklādayo hi gavādiraṃ sajātīyebhyaḥ kṛṣṇagavādibhyo vyāvartayanti /
GK16visa02cu:339: (vi, ta) nanu saṃketitor'thaḥ kiṃ dharmo dharmo vā ityatrāha--saṅketiteti /
GK16visa02cu:342: etad rūpo yo vastudharmaḥ sa siddho nitya ityāha--siddho vastudharma iti---etanmeta guṇā api nityā eva---utpattivināśapratītistvāvirbhāvatirobhāvarūpaiva
GK16visa02cu:343: guṇānāṃ viśeṣādhānaṃ grāhayati--suklādayohi iti--vyāvarttayanti vilakṣaṇatayā bodhayanti harihareti /
GK16visa02cu:345: tadaṅgīkarttṝṇāṃ mate tu ayamapi jātiśabda eva /
GK16visa02cu:347: kriyā iti--sādhyarūpāḥ janyarūpā mahāpralaye paramāṇūnāmapi niṣkriyatvena kriyāyā na nityatvam,
GK16visa02cu:354: yadi ca ekavyaktāveva saṃketagraha ityucyate tadāha---vyabhicāreti /
GK16visa02cu:355: yadvyaktau saṃketo gṛhītastatabhinnastatsajātīyavyaktāvapi svarūpodbodhāt kāraṇaṃ śaktigrahaṃ vināpi kāryyabodhād vyabhicārajoṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:360: kecid vyaktyākṛtijātaya ityādīni matāntarāṇi parihṛtya sarveṣāṃ vāṅmayānā vyākaraṇamūlatvāt
GK16visa02cu:361: alaṅkāraprantheṣu ca prāyeṇa tadanugatatvenaiva vyavahārācca mahābhāṣyakāramatamāśrityāha---saṅketa iti /
GK16visa02cu:368: hetuṃ vināpi ayaṃ ḍitthaḥ ḍavittha ityādirūpeṇaṃ śṛṅgagrāhikayā vaktṛsaṃketena vyaktiṣu sānniveśitaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:369: sajātīyaśūnye ḍitthādyarthopasthāpakaḥ śabdaḥ saṃketasya viṣaya iti /
GK16visa02cu:372: iha ca dravyasyopādhiviṣayatvāsambhave 'pi tatsaṃjñāyāḥ upādhitvena tattvamupacārāt /
GK16visa02cu:373: ḍitthādyarthe cānantyavyabhicārābhāvāt upādhiṃ vinaiva sambhavati vācyavācakasambandhasamayagraha iti nopādhirapekṣyate /
GK16visa02cu:376: ata eva guṇadravyakiyāsu ceti dravyakiyāsu ceti dravyasya saṃketaviṣayatvamuktaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:378: ānantyeti-vyaktīnāmanantatvāt pratyekaṃ ca rekhoparekhādisaṃsthānaviśeṣasya ca bhinnatvāt tatrāśakyaḥ sabhayagraha iti /
GK16visa02cu:379: nanvevaṃ gavādipadena saṃketitatvāt jātāvantarhitāyāṃ kathaṃ vyaktipratītiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:382: tatrānupayogitayā vyakteḥ śabdabodhitatvaṃ vinā śābde 'nvaye praveśāsambhava iti jātyabhidhāyake śabde tadbonārthaṃ vyañjanaiva vṛttirūpāsitumuciteti rahasyam /
GK16visa02cu:384: kiṃ ca saṃśayāpagamārtham upāttāni padāni saṃsargasya mukhyāṅgaṃ saṃsṛjyamānaṃ vyaktirūpaṃ sākṣānna bodhayanti,
GK16visa02cu:390: sāmānyasya sarvaviśeṣatvāṅgīkārāt saṅketena sarvaviśeṣyajñāne tu sarvasyāpi sarvajñatvāpattiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:391: prathamoddeśakāle tu sarvavyaktīnāṃ sāmmukhyāṅgīkāratayā sāmānyaliṅgitayā pratyaṅgīkāre punarādhunikasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya prathamopadeśakālavat sammukhīkāreṇaiva pratītiḥ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:392: tataścānvayopapādikāyāḥ sākṣāt pratīteḥ padasya śaktyantaraṃ vinā kiṃ bījabhityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16visa02cu:399: (vi, tha) lakṣyo lakṣaṇayā grāhyaḥ ityuktatvāllakṣaṇāyā lakṣaṇamāha---mukhyārtheti /
GK16visa02cu:402: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau mukhyārthasya gaṅgāyā abādhāt;
GK16visa02cu:409: tathā ca etattritayajñāpitayā yā vṛttyā mukhyārthādanyo mukhyārthasambaddhor'thaḥ pratīyate asau śaktirvṛttirlakṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:414: yā tu vyaṅgyārthe tātparyyakhyā vṛttirdhvanikenoktā yā ca padārthadvayasaṃsarge tātparyyākhyā vṛttiḥ prācīvanaiyāyikairuktā sā naitāttritaya-jñāpitā;
GK16visa02cu:417: tena chatriṇo gacchanti kuntāḥ praviśantītyatra mukhyārthayoḥ chatrikuntayoḥ gamanapraveśānvayasattve 'pi niruktamukhyārthabādhasattvānnāvyāptiḥ
GK16visa02cu:419: atra ca tātparyyaviṣayatvānupādāne tu chatrikuntayorgamanapraveśānvayasya mukhyatāvacchedakaccha tritvakuntābhyāmutpadyamānatvāt--tatrāvyāptyāpatteḥ
GK16visa02cu:421: tātparyyaviṣayasya chatrisārthavāhino gamanānvayasya kuntinaḥ praveśānvayasya ca lakṣatāvacchedakacchatrisārthavāhitvakuntitvābhyāmupapatteḥ
GK16visa02cu:423: tena ghaṭapadasya nīlaghaṭe lakṣaṇāyāṃ tasya ghaṭanyatvābhāve 'pi nāvyāptiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:426: (lo, e) atheti-athābhidhānantaraṃ lakṣaṇoddeśakramaprāptā lakṣaṇā nirūṇyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:427: mukhyārtheti---mukhyārtho gaṅgādiśabdasya jalamayādiḥ tasya ca ādheyapadārthāntare 'nvayānupapattau,
GK16visa02cu:428: na ca yataḥ kutaścit yadeva tadeva lakṣyate-atiprasaṅgādityata āha---tadyukta iti /
GK16visa02cu:429: tena mukhyārthena yena kenacit sambandhena sambaddhaḥ anyor'thaḥ taṭādiḥ yayā śabdaśaktyā pratīyate bodhyate;
GK16visa02cu:430: na ca sambandhamātrādapi lakṣyārthapratītiḥ api prasaṅgādeva ityāha--rūḍheḥ prayojanād vā /
GK16visa02cu:431: kvacid rūḍheḥ anādivṛddhavyavahāraprasiddheḥ kvacit pāvanatvādyatiśayaṃ prayojanamuddiśya /
GK16visa02cu:438: ñasaṃbhavan yayā śabdaśaktyā svasaṃyuktān puruṣādīn pratyāyayati,
GK16visa02cu:439: yayā ca “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau gaṅgādiśabdo jalamayādirūpārthavācakatvātprakṛte 'saṃbhavan svasya sāmīpyādisaṃbandhasaṃbandhinaṃ taṭādiṃ
GK16visa02cu:440: sā śabdasyārpitā svābhaviketarā īśvarānudbhāvitā vā śaktirlakṣaṇā nāma /
GK16visa02cu:442: uttaratra “gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣaḥ” iti pratipādanālabhyasya śītatvapāvanatvātiśayasya bodhanarūpaṃ prayojanam /
GK16visa02cu:443: hetuṃ vināpi yasya kasyacitsaṃbandhino lakṣaṇo 'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāt, ityuktam--
GK16visa02cu:462: (lo, ai) udāharaṇadarśanapūrvakaṃ kārikārthaṃ vṛttyā viśadayati--kaliṅga iti /
GK16visa02cu:463: svārthe vācyarūpe 'sambhavan deśaviśeṣādirūpārthasyācetanatayā sāhasikādyarthenānvayānupapattyānupapadyamānaprayogaḥ kuta ityāha--jalamayādirūpārthasya vācakatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:464: ayamarthaḥ--gaṅgadiśabdo yasmāt jalamayādirūpamevārthaṃ samayasmaraṇākātaraḥ san smārayati,
GK16visa02cu:465: tasmād vācyarūpasya jalādyarthasya ghoṣādyarthena sahānvayānupapattyā prakṛte vācakatvena tasya prayogo na ghaṭata iti /
GK16visa02cu:478: gaṅgātaṭa ityādau taṭasya gaṅgāśabdena pratipādanāt gaṅgātādātmyapratīteḥ gaṅgārthaniṣṭānāṃ naṭārthaniṣṭhātiśayitānāṃ śītatvapāvanatvādīnāṃ pratītirlakṣaṇāyāḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:482: kuśāṃllātīti vyutpattilabhyaḥ kuśagrāhirūpo mukhyor'thaḥ prakṛte 'saṃbhavan vivecakatvādisādharmyasambandhasambandhinaṃ dakṣarūpamarthaṃ bodhayati
GK16visa02cu:486: vyutpattilabhyasya mukhyārthatve “gauḥ śete” ityatrāpi lakṣaṇā syāt /
GK16visa02cu:488: iti gamadhatorḍepratyayena vyutpāditasya gośabdasya śayanakāle prayogāt /
GK16visa02cu:493: dakṣasyaiva mukhyārthatvāditi---bhūriprayogeṇa dakṣatvasya laghutvena ca tadacchinnasyaiva śakyatvena mukhyatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:496: tathā ca tenaiva nimittena śabdasya pravṛttestadavacchinna eva mukhyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:498: yathā dakṣe śaktasya kuśalapadasya gṛhaviśeṣe śaktasya maṇḍapapadasya ca daivakarmaṇi kuśala iti rogī maṇḍapa iti ca tayodavakarmarogipadasamabhivyāharasya tātparyyagrāhakatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:499: gauḥ śete ityatra śete iti suptagoḥ- pradarśanārthameva /
GK16visa02cu:500: gaurastīti suptagavi prayoge 'pi lakṣaṇā syāditi bodhyam /
GK16visa02cu:504: iti sūtreṇa vadataḥ pāṇineḥ ayamabhiprāyo yaduṇādipratyayānāṃ prāyikyeva vyutpattiriti,
GK16visa02cu:506: tathā ca gotvenaiva rūpeṇa rūḍhiśaktyā gopadaṃ svapadagacchad gosādhāraṇyena prayujyate,
GK16visa02cu:512: (lo, o) kecittviti---prakṛte karmaṇi kuśala ityanenāpi arthatayāsambhavan anupapattirbādhitaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:514: gośabdo yadyapi gamanārtho vyutpattinimittaṃ tathāpi gotvāpattikiyaiva pravṛttinimittam ata eva gacchatyāgacchati gavi gośabdaprayogaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:515: yadāha, ghaṭaśabdaprasaṃge“ghaṭaṃna ca tadātmatvāpattirūpā kiyā matā'; iti /
GK16visa02cu:517: --tayoḥ rūḍhiprayojanābhyāṃ dvidhoktayorlakṣaṇayorbhedān viśeṣān bhidyate 'nena iti bheda iti vyutpattyā /
GK16visa02cu:530: atra tātparyyaviṣayatvaṃ yadi anvayaviśeṣaṇaṃ na kriyate tadā chatriṇe gacchanti kuntāḥ praviśanti ityādiṣu avyāptiḥ syāt;
GK16visa02cu:540: anayorhi śvetādibhiḥ kuntādibhiścācetanatayā kevalairdhāvanapraveśanakriyayoḥ kartṛtayānvayamalabhamānairetatsiddhaye ātmasambandhino 'śvādayaḥ puruṣāda yaścākṣipyante /
GK16visa02cu:545: kuntā iti kuntavanta ityarthaḥ anayormukhyārthānvayabādhaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa02cu:547: śvetādibhirityādipadāt nīlādiguṇānāṃ kuntādibhirityādi padāt astrāntarāṇāṃ ca parigrahaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:550: vastutastu chatriṇo gacchanti ityatra chatriṇaścetanatve 'pi tātparyyaviṣayacchatryanvayattyālābha eva sarvasādhāraṇo mukhyārthabādho bodhyaḥ
GK16visa02cu:573: iha khalvabhidhayā bodhitasyāpi śvetakuntādyarthasya punaḥ puruṣāderviśeṣaṇatayā lakṣaṇīyatvena upādānamiti /
GK16visa02cu:585: upādānalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu mukhyārthasyāpi viṣayatā iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:587: tathā ca vākyārthe bodhye parasya amukhyārthasya anvayasiddhaye anvayabodhāya yasyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ svasya arpaṇaṃ paramātraviṣayatā;
GK16visa02cu:599: atra kaliṅgaḥ sāhasika iti na pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:600: kintu kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti ityeva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:602: ubhayatraiva mukhyārthaṃ kaliṅgarūpaṃ deśaṃ pravāharūpāṃ saṅgā ca vihāya taddeśasthapuruṣatattīrayoḥ parayoranvayaprabodhāya puruṣatari-rūpa-mātra-viṣayatā lakṣaṇāyāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:607: kaliṅgagaṅgāśabdau ityatra kaliṅgagaṅgāśabādapadaṃ tanniṣṭhalakṣaṇādvayaparaṃ yathā vyākhyātārthanusāreṇa bodhyam /
GK16visa02cu:614: “apakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param /
GK16visa02cu:625: tvayā bahu upakṛtaṃ tatra kimucyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:632: kintu apakāradurjanatvalakṣaṇayoḥ phalaṃ sambodhyasya kauṭilyaṃ duḥ khitalakṣaṇāyāstu kauṭilyaphalatvam /
GK16visa02cu:634: (lo, ā) apakārārdānāmityādiśabdena durjanatvaduḥ khitatve upakṛtādayaṃ ityādiśabdena sujanatvasukhitatve /
GK16visa02cu:648: viṣayiṇā anigīrṇasya viṣayasya tenaiva saha tādātmyapratītikṛtsāropā /
GK16visa02cu:654: tasya anigārṇṇasya anācchāditasya arthāt svavācakanāmapadena uktasya anyatādātmyaṃ śakyārthābhedaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:656: nigīrṇṇasya viśiṣya svāvācaka-nāmapadena anuktasya tu sādhyavasānikā matetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:666: (lo, i) evaṃ caturvidhāpi lakṣaṇā pratyekaṃ sāropā sādhyavasānā ityaṣṭavidhetyāha--āropeti /
GK16visa02cu:669: evaṃ svaśabdārthanāmnā gatārthe 'pi sphuṭīkaraṇāya lakṣaṇena nirddiśati--viṣayasyeti /
GK16visa02cu:686: atra sarvanāmneti---kāvyaprakāśe tu sarvanāmnā lakṣyārthanirddeśe viśiṣya svāvācakakuntādipadenānupādānāt sādhyavasānaiva setyuktam /
GK16visa02cu:690: svasamaveta ityanena samavāyarūpasya lakṣaṇāhetoḥ svasambandhasya nigaraṇaṃ śvetaguṇa āropyamāṇaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:691: prayojana ityanantaraṃ pūrvoktā upādānalakṣaṇā sāropeti anuṣajyate /
GK16visa02cu:715: (vi, va) kaliṅgaḥ puruṣa iti---atra puruṣapadena lakṣyārthopādānāt anigīrṇṇatvam /
GK16visa02cu:721: āyuridamiti sādhyavasānāyamavyabhicāra iti dvayoḥ pṛthak prayojanadvayamuktam /
GK16visa02cu:722: kāryyakāraṇabhāvarūpasambandhena sāropāṃ lakṣaṇāmuktvā sambandhāntarairapi tāṃ darśayati---rājarkāyetīti /
GK16visa02cu:723: atra asāvitipadena lakṣyārthe puruṣe nirddiṣṭe rājño 'bhedāropāt sāropā /
GK16visa02cu:735: asyāścaturṣviti rūḍhiprayojanadvaye upādānalakṣaṇādvayaṃ taddvaye lakṣaṇalakṣaṇādvayaṃ ceti sādhyavasānāyaścatvārobhedāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:738: iti yaddvayamudāhṛtaṃ rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāḥ “kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti';
GK16visa02cu:739: iti prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu rājakīye puruṣe gacchati “rājāsau gacchati';
GK16visa02cu:740: iti yadudāhṛtaṃ tatra idaṃ padatyāgena udāharaṇamityata etāni catvāri sādhyavasānāyā udāharaṇānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:742: eteṣu caturṣu hi kartryā khyātenaiva kartṛlakṣyārthasya upasthāpanāt nāmapadena tu anupasthānānnigīrṇṇatā /
GK16visa02cu:745: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti tu lakṣaṇalakṣaṇodāharaṇaṃ yaddarśetaṃ tattu na sādhyavasānodāharaṇam /
GK16visa02cu:747: evaṃ ca rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇedāharaṇaṃ kaliṅga ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tatra sāhasika iti prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:748: nāmapadena sāhasika ityanena lakṣyārthasya puruṣasyopādānāt sāropatvena sādhyavasānatvābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:749: kintu kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti ityeva tatra pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:750: itthamupādānalakṣaṇālakṣaṇalakṣaṇayoḥ rūḍhiprayojanahetukatvena caturvidhayoḥ sāropāsādhyavasānikārūpatvena dvaiguṇyāt aṣṭavidhatvam /
GK16visa02cu:752: (lo, u) evamārope rūḍhiprayojanayorudāharaṇe catuṣṭayaṃ darśayitvā viṣayavyāptyarthaṃ
GK16visa02cu:753: sambandhabhedena udāharaṇānyāha--yathā vetyādi---rājāsau ityatra pūrvavat adaḥ śabdena viṣayaprakaṭanam /
GK16visa02cu:757: atra idaṃśabdo rājā asau ityatra ca adaḥ śabdavat /
GK16visa02cu:767: sādṛśyetarasambandhāḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāvādirūpāḥ pūrvadarśitāḥ sakalā aṣṭavidhā api suddhāḥ śuddhaparibhāṣitāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:768: sādṛśyasambandhāttu tā aṣṭavidhā gauṇyaḥ sādṛśyaghaṭakarūpaśakyaguṇayogarūpayogārthena gauṇyo gauṇīparibhāṣitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:771: (lo ū) evamaṣṭavidhāpi lakṣaṇā pratyekaṃ śuddhā gauṇī ceti ṣoḍaśaprakāreti darśayati---sādṛśyetareti /
GK16visa02cu:785: atra tailaśabdastilabhavasneharūpaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva sārṣapādiṣu sneheṣu vartate /
GK16visa02cu:788: (lo, ṛ) etānīti---atra tailaśabdasya tilabhavastrehamātravācakatvāt prakṛte tasya kevalasya sukhamayatvādivivakṣaṇat mukhyārthabādaḥ;
GK16visa02cu:789: prayojanābhāvāt rūḍiḥ upādānalakṣaṇātvaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva iti vṛttyā smāritam /
GK16visa02cu:790: streheṣu varttata ityanena ubhayoḥ streharūpatvāt sādṛśyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:795: rājakumāreṣu tatsadṛśeṣu ca gacchatsu“ete rājakumārā gacchanti” /
GK16visa02cu:800: tasya cikkaṇatākāritvena sādṛśyāśrayaṃ śakyalakṣyobhayamevātra taila śabdārtha ityato mukhyopādānam /
GK16visa02cu:803: ubhayatraiva etāni ete iti sarvanāmapadena lakṣyārthopādānāt tatra śakyārthatādātmyāropācca sāropā lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa02cu:813: kintu śakyārthāvyāvarttakena śakyalakṣyasādhāraṇyena sukhapadena lakṣyārthopasthāpanāttasyācchādanarūpā nigīrṇṇatā /
GK16visa02cu:826: atra duḥ khadāyitvena kaṇṭakasadṛśaḥ gauḍendro lakṣyārthaḥ svaśabdenaivopāttaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:845: tatra karmākhyātenopasthāpite śodhye karmaṇi vaurīṇi prathamāntakaṇṭapadaśakyārthasya tādātmyāropāt /
GK16visa02cu:850: (lo, ṝ) prayojana ityanantaram upādānalakṣaṇā sāropā gauṇītyanuṣajyate,
GK16visa02cu:860: gaurvāhīka ityādietasmin udāharaṇe yathā prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sāropā gauṇī /
GK16visa02cu:862: evaṃ gaurjalpatītyatrāpi prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sādhyavasānā gauṇī /
GK16visa02cu:871: (vi, ga) atra keciditi---svārtho gotvaṃ tatsahacāriṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:874: tathā ca jaḍatvena rūpeṇa vāhīkaḥ śaktyaiva,
GK16visa02cu:877: ayaṃ ca doṣaḥ tat siddhāntānavakalenādeva dharme lakṣaṇayā eva dharmiṇi śaktigrāhakatvasya taiḥ siddhāntitatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:878: gośabdārtheti---sakṛduccāritasya śabdasya sakṛdarthabodhanena śabdavirityā abhidhāyā api virateriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:880: (lo, ḷ) samprati pūrvapakṣanirāsapūrvakaṃ gauṇyā vṛtterlakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāvaṃ darśayan ekatrāpi udāharaṇe vipratipattinirāsena sarvamapi sāmañjasyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha--atreti /
GK16visa02cu:882: lakṣyante lakṣaṇayā bodhyante te tatra lakṣitā guṇāḥ;
GK16visa02cu:883: cakāreṇa na khalu teṣāṃ lakṣitatvamātreṇa viśrantiriti,
GK16visa02cu:885: punarutthānābhāvāt śabdabuddhikarmmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāva iti nyāyāt,
GK16visa02cu:889: kintu svārthasahacāriguṇasājātyena vāhīkārthagatā guṇā eva lakṣyante /
GK16visa02cu:893: (vi, gha) guṇā eva lakṣyanta iti---vāhīkapratītistvākṣepāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:898: sājātyena sambandhena vāhīkagatā guṇā jāḍyamāndyādaya eva ;
GK16visa02cu:900: lakṣyante lakṣaṇayā bodhyante tat samanantaroktaṃ matāntaramapi /
GK16visa02cu:931: vastutastu jātiśaktivāde jātyavinābhāvalabhyāyā vyakteḥ śābdabodhapraveśavadatrāpi tathātve bādhakābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:939: tasmādatra gośabdo mukhyayāvṛttyā vāhīkaśabdena sahānvayamalabhamāno 'jñatvādisādharmyasaṃbandhādvāhīkārthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa02cu:943: (vi, ca) tathā hi gośabdasya vāhīkagatajāḍyamāndyādi guṇor'thaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:954: etasyā gauṇyākhyāyā vṛttermukhyārthabādhāditritayahetukatvāt lakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāvaḥ sphuṭa eva ityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:956: gaurvāhīka ityatra govāhīkaśabdayostādātmyapratītyā vāhīke jāḍyādyatiśayaḥ pratīyate
GK16visa02cu:962: ata eva kvacit taṭādau gaṅgadisambandhāt kiñcit śetyādikamastvevaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:963: kintu gaṅgāśabdena pratipādane gaṅgātvapratītau tatśaityādikamādhikaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visa02cu:966: kiñca gaurvāhīka ityukte 'pi pratipattuḥ sarvathā nābhedapratipattiḥ,
GK16visa02cu:968: taduktaṃ śārīrikamīmāṃsāvyākhyāne vācaspatimiśraiḥ---“api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena varttata';
GK16visa02cu:969: iti yatra prayoktṛpratipattroḥ sampratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ,
GK16visa02cu:974: upacāro hi nāmātyantaṃ viśakalitayoḥ śabdayoḥ sādṛśyātiśayamahimnā bhedapratītisthaganamātram /
GK16visa02cu:983: nanu tatrāpi samānavibhaktikatvavaśādāyurghṛtayoḥ prathamabhedopacāro 'steyeva ityata āha---upacāro hīti /
GK16visa02cu:988: (lo, a) etadabhipretya uktaprakāreṇa lakṣaṇāviśeṣaṇayorgauṇaśuddhayorbhedaṃ darśayatiiyaṃ ceti /
GK16visa02cu:996: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā lakṣaṇā daśitāstāḥ prayojanarūpavyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatayā pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā ṣoḍhaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1009: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā darśitā iti ṣoḍaśasu rūḍhāvaṣṭau prayojane tvaṣṭāviti darśatatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1015: āviṣkarotīti--upadeśakatvasya gurudharmatvena yauvanamade tadbādhāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1017: kāvyaprakāśe tu śikṣādānameva lakṣyārthastatrānāyāsa eva prayojanamabhidheyavat sarvajanavedyam /
GK16visa02cu:1018: taddhi prayonajamupadeśasya vākyārthasya dharmo lakṣyārthe śikṣādāne pratīyate---upadeśāt śikṣāyāṃ cānāyāsaḥ sarvajanavedya eva iti tadabhiprāyaḥ
GK16visa02cu:1024: ābhyāmeva vyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatvābhyāṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau kāvyaprakāraviśeṣau vakṣyete /
GK16visa02cu:1027: etā anantaroktāḥ ṣoḍaśabhedā lakṣaṇāḥ phalasya dharmigatatvena dharmagatatvena ca pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā dvātriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1029: “strigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladvalākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1030: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava” //
GK16visa02cu:1036: dharmastu lakṣyārthaniṣṭhapadārthaḥ strigdhaśyāmaleti---prāvṛṭkāle upasthite sītāvirahiṇo rāmasyeyamuktiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1038: payodasuhṛdāṃmayūrāṇām ete virahoddīpakāḥ kāmaṃ svācchandyena santu tathāpi māṃ mārayituṃ na śaktā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1042: ata uktaṃ ghanādikaṃ sarvamahaṃ sahe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1050: atrātyantaduḥkhasahiṣṇurūpe rāme dharmiṇi lakṣye tasyaivātiśayaḥ phalam /
GK16visa02cu:1054: (vi, ña) rāme lakṣye iti---ghanādyuddīpakasaharāmatvasya prayojakatvādduḥ khasahiṣṇutvarūpeṇa rāmo lakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1055: tasyaivātiśaya iti tasyaiva duḥ khasahiṣṇo rāmasyātiśayaḥ vipralambharūpaḥ,
GK16visa02cu:1057: tat kathamidaṃ dharmagatasyodāharaṇaṃ na darśitamiti vācyam /
GK16visa02cu:1064: atra cātiśayitāṃśo nātiprayojanaḥ sampātāyāta eva bodhyaḥ nanvatra dharmigate śītatvapāvanatve eva prayojane kiṃ na syāditicenna /
GK16visa02cu:1066: tataśca lakṣaṇayā taṭapratītau tatsambandhinoḥ tayoḥ smaraṇasyaivaṃ sambhavena vyaṅgyatvaniyamarahitayostayoratiśaya eva prayojanamityabhiprāyāt
GK16visa02cu:1072: rāmo 'haṃ sarvaṃ saha ityatra rāmasya sarvaṃsahatvasyāprasiddheḥ;
GK16visa02cu:1074: tena phalāt atyantaduḥ khasahiṣṇū rāmo 'smi iti śabdābhidhānālabhyaṃ tathābhūtarāmaviśeṣasya evātiśayastanniṣṭameva prayojanamiti /
GK16visa02cu:1088: (vi, ṭa) phale dvātriṃśaditi--pūrvoktāṣṭavidhaprayojanasya gūḍhāgūḍhatvābhyāṃ draiguṇyena ṣoḍaśavidhasya dharmidharmagatatvena dvaiguṇyād dvātriṃśadityarthaḥ
GK16visa02cu:1090: gaṅgāyāmiti--nanvidamapi ghoṣanvayavaśāt vākyameva yadi ca vākyasthaikapadasyaiva lākṣaṇikatvāttadvyaṅgyasya padagatatvaṃ tadā upakṛtaṃ bahvityatrāpi na vākyagatatvam /
GK16visa02cu:1091: upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate iti vākyasthasyopakṛtapadasya ekasyaiva lakṣaṇikatvāditi cenna /
GK16visa02cu:1094: naca kimucyate ityantasya bhinnavākyatvāt kathaṃ tayorekavākyatvamiti vākyam,
GK16visa02cu:1097: (lo, ī) tasmāt evamuktaprakāreṇa“upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra“ityatra bahupadaniṣṭatvābhiprāyeṇa vākyagatatvam /
GK16visa02cu:1098: evameva hi dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyadoṣaguṇālaṅkārāṇāṃ vākyaniṣṭatvam prācīnālaṅkāragranthaṣvapi prayaśo dṛśyate /
GK16visa02cu:1108: tisṛṣu vṛttiṣu svaṃ svamarthaṃ bodhayitvopakṣīṇāsu yathā aparo 'nyo 'nyor'tho bodhyate
GK16visa02cu:1114: etannyāyāt śabdasyeva tanniṣṭhavṛtterapi viratiḥ siddhyati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1121: tatrāpi lakṣaṇāyā abhāve tu prathamamate tu dvayoḥ dvitīyamate tvekasyāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1133: tairanekārthasya śabdasya ekārthe niyantrite arthāntarabodhaṃ pratirudhya bodhite sati anyasya pratiruddhārthasya dhiyo heturyā vṛttiḥ sā vyañjanābhidhāśrayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1136: (lo, ū) anekārthasya viṣṇusiṃhādyanekābhidheyaśabdasya haryyādeḥ ekārthe niyantrite ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1138: anyasya saṃyogādisācivyābhāvāt abhidhāyā aviṣayasya buddhihetuḥ vyañjanā /
GK16visa02cu:1152: sāhacaryyaṃ-samabhivyāhṛtapadārthena saha sarvadā sthitiḥ virodhitā vairitā sāpi tādṛśāparapadārthena saha /
GK16visa02cu:1164: etanmate tu yasya padārthasyānvayabodhastasyaiva viśeṣasya smaraṇamiti /
GK16visa02cu:1166: (lo, ṛ) uktaṃ hi bhartṛhariṇā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1193: “bhāti rathāṅgam” rathāṅgam” iti napuṃsakavyaktyā rathāṅgaṃ cakram /
GK16visa02cu:1194: svarastu veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛnna kāvya iti tasya viṣayo nodāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1238: tasya kāmakātaratāyogyatvābhāvāt śaśī na tu karpūram /
GK16visa02cu:1241: veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛt iti anekārthavācakaśabdasya ekārthavācakatve niyantraṇarūpaḥ,
GK16visa02cu:1242: tatpratyayaṃ ca svaro vede eva karoti /
GK16visa02cu:1243: yathā indraśatrurityādau ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣe samāsāntodāttasūcite indrasya śamīyatā vā daityo 'rirevābhidhīyate /
GK16visa02cu:1244: bahuvrīhau tu pūrvapadāntodāttanirṇote indra eva śamayitā śātayitā ceti /
GK16visa02cu:1249: udāttādirūpo 'pi muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśā śṛṅgārādirasaviśeṣapratītikṛdeva” iti etadviṣaye udāharaṇamucitameva iti,
GK16visa02cu:1251: svarāḥ kākkādayaḥ udāttādayo vā vyaṅgyarūpameva viśeṣaṃ pratyāyanti,
GK16visa02cu:1257: śabdārthasyānavacchede viśeṣasmṛtihetava ityatra viśeṣapadasyār'thānavabodhane iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1262: muneḥ pāṭhaguṇoktamārgaśca taireva darśito yathā---“yathāha munirbharataḥ----“hasyaśṛṅgarayoḥ svarītodāttaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:1274: kiñca yadi yatra kvacidanekārthaśabdānāṃ prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādaniyantritayorapyarthayoranurūpasvaravaśenaikatra niyamanaṃ vācyaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:1278: (vi, ta) muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśeti--muninā vedasya svaraviśeṣeṇaiva paṭhanāt /
GK16visa02cu:1283: ekārthaniyamane 'nyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena tasyopamānatvāt upamādhvanitvasyaiva prasakternatu śleṣasya /
GK16visa02cu:1284: yathā vakṣyamāṇe durgālaṅghitavigrahe ityādau prakaraṇādumāmahādevīvallabhabhānudevarājaniyamane pārvatīvallabhasya vyaṅgyatvena rājñaḥ tadupamādhvanireva
GK16visa02cu:1286: na ca tathā, ata evāhuḥ śleṣanirūpaṇaprastāve--
GK16visa02cu:1292: (lo e) evaṃ pracīnoktaṃ dūṣayitvā svayameva pūrvapakṣamutpādya nirācaṣṭe-kiñceti /
GK16visa02cu:1296: yasyāhuḥ śaśimat śiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ
GK16visa02cu:1298: ityādau dvayorapyarthayorhariharastutiparayoranurūpaḥ svara udāttādirekatra harau hare vā /
GK16visa02cu:1304: ceṣṭādītyādiśabdena---“itaḥ sa daityaḥ prāptaśrīrneta evārhati kṣayam';
GK16visa02cu:1307: evamekasminnarthe 'bhidhayā niyantrite yā śabdārthasyānyārthabuddhihetuḥ śaktiḥ sābhidhāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visa02cu:1326: “durgālaṅghitavigraho manasijaṃ saṃmīlayaṃstejasā prodyadrājakalo gṛhītagarimā viṣvagvṛto bhogibhiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1327: nakṣatreśakṛ tekṣaṇo girigurau gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan gāmākramya vibhūtibhūṣitatanū rājatyumāvallabhaḥ” //
GK16visa02cu:1328: atra prakaraṇonābhidhayā umāvallabhaśabdasyomānāmnīmahādevīvallabhabhānudevanṛpatirūper'the niyantrite vyañjanayaiva gaurīvallabharūpor'tho bodhyate /
GK16visa02cu:1333: atra umā nāma mahādevī tasyā vallabho bhānudevanṛpatiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1336: tejasā dehakāntyā manasijaṃ sammīlayan sāndairyyagavārta saṅkocayan /
GK16visa02cu:1341: kṣatraiśeṣu kṣatriyeśvareṣu rājasu avajñayā na kṛtekṣaṇo akṛtadṛkpātaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1343: gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ prītiṃ dhārayan gāmākramya pṛthivīmadhikṛtya,
GK16visa02cu:1347: tathā hi--umāyāḥ pārvatyā vallabho maheśo rājati /
GK16visa02cu:1357: girīṇāṃ gurau himālaye gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan śvaśuratvāt svīyataponilayatvācca /
GK16visa02cu:1360: itthamatrāprākaraṇike maheśe vyañjite prakṛte saṅgamanāya maheśa iva rājetyupamāvyañjanādupamādhvanirayam /
GK16visa02cu:1362: (lo, ai) durgālaṅghiteti---durgāṇi vanagirijalamayasthānāni durgā pārvatī ca,
GK16visa02cu:1375: śreṣṭe ca gāṃ pṛthivīṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca /
GK16visa02cu:1379: iha ca umāvallabhaśabdena yo 'yamaprakṛto maheśvarārthaḥ pratīyate tasyāsambaddhatvamāsīditi maheśvarabhānudevayorupamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpyate
GK16visa02cu:1381: ityatrai vakārasyāyamāśayaḥ-iha khalūmāvallabhaśabde yeyaṃ dvitīyārthapratītiḥ tatrābhidhāyā prakṛtārthamātrabodhane viramāt lakṣaṇāyāśca mukhyārthabodhahetukatvāt
GK16visa02cu:1385: ataśca prathamamumāvallabhādiśabdena rājārthabodhanād viratāyāṃ prathamābhidhāyāṃ dvitīyaḥ śabdaḥ tanniṣṭābhidhāśaktyā dvitīyārthaṃ bodhayatu kiṃ vṛttyantarakalpanayā iti cenna /
GK16visa02cu:1386: atra hi śabdadvayakalpane kathaṃ prakṛtārthasya prathamaṃ pratītiranubhūyate,
GK16visa02cu:1388: evaṃ“bhramimaratim“ityādāvapi viṣaśabdasya garalārthatve bhujaṅgādipadasācivyāt na panarabhidhāyā ujjīvanaṃ,
GK16visa02cu:1392: “yena dhvastam” ityādau tu niyāmakābhāvāt anekārthaviṣayaḥ sandehaḥ“vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām“ityādau cobhayābhidhānamapīti caṇḍīdāsapaṇḍitāḥ
GK16visa02cu:1398: kiñca dvitīyārthabodhane dharmikalpanāto varaṃ dharmakalpaneti bhinnaśabdakalpanāt bhinnā eva vyañjanākhyā vṛttiraṅgīkarttumucitā ;
GK16visa02cu:1399: tasyāstu yatra tatra prasare 'tiprasaṅgabhītyā sambandhatvena saivābhidhāśrīyata iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16visa02cu:1403: yayā pratyāyyate sā syādvyañjanā lakṣaṇāśrayā // VisSd_2.15 //
GK16visa02cu:1410: “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau jalamayādyarthabodhanādabhidhāyāṃ taṭādyarthabodhanācca lakṣaṇāyāṃ viratāyāṃ yayā śītatvapāvanatvādyatiśayādirbodhyate sā lakṣaṇāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visa02cu:1421: (lo, au) prakaraṇasaṅgatimāha evamiti--bodhyate yaḥ sa boddhavyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1424: ucyate śabdena pratipādyate yaḥ sa vācyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1432: “kālo madhuḥ kupita eṣa ca puṣpadhanvā dhīrā vahanti ratikhedaharāḥ samīrāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1433: kelīvanīyamapi vañjulakuñjamañjur- dūre patiḥ kathaya kiṃ karaṇīyamadya” //
GK16visa02cu:1434: atraitaṃ deśaṃ prati śīghraṃ pracchannakāmukastvayā preṣyatāmiti sakhīṃ prati kayācidvyajyate /
GK16visa02cu:1446: (vi, na) kālo madhuriti--sakhīṃ prati proṣitabharttṛkāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa02cu:1449: īdṛśavyaṅgyabodhe kelīvanīrūpasya tatpradarśanena karaṇīyājajñāsārthakavākyasya tat vaktryā uddīpakapradarśanalabdhaśṛṅgāraprakaraṇasya madhurūpakālasya ca vailakṣaṇyaṃ hetuḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1453: “niḥ śeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanataṭaṃ nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharo netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1456: bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam” //
GK16visa02cu:1459: (vi, pa) niḥ śeṣeti--upanāyakamānetuṃ preṣitāṃ yuvatiṃ tenaiva upabhuktāmāgatyāsau matprārthanayāpi nāyāta iti pratārayantīṃ dūtīṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ solluṇṭhanoktiriyam /
GK16visa02cu:1462: bāndhavajanasya mama ajñātakāmapīḍāgame itaḥ strātuṃ vāpīṃ gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikaṃ gatāsi /
GK16visa02cu:1468: netre ca dūramatiśayaṃ yathā syāttathānañjane jāte iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1470: tathā iyaṃ tanvī kṛśā tava tanuḥ pulakitā;
GK16visa02cu:1481: iyaṃ tanuḥ cirakāle 'pi strāne idānīṃ pulakitā;
GK16visa02cu:1485: atra tadantikameva rantuṃ gatāsīti viparītalakṣaṇayā lakṣyam /
GK16visa02cu:1486: tasya ca rantumiti vyaṅgyaṃ pratipādyaṃ dūtīvaiśiṣṭyādbodhyate /
GK16visa02cu:1494: tathā dūraṃ cumbanaspṛṣṭaṃ netraprāntabhāgaṃ prāpya anañjane strāne tu samastanetrasyaivānañjanatvamuktaṃ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:1495: tathā candanacyutimahinmā grīṣmakālaprāptau pulakena ca tadānīṃ snānena pulakābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1498: atra gamanaṃ lakṣaṇayeti yaduktaṃ tat kāvyaprakāśakārasyāsammatam /
GK16visa02cu:1500: tathā hi na gatāsītyasya kāvyatvena tatra lakṣaṇāyā evābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1502: padalakṣaṇā tu na sambhavatyeva gamanasya gamadhātuvācyatvādeva /
GK16visa02cu:1504: yadi ca vākye 'pi lakṣaṇā svīkriyate tathāpi na lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa02cu:1506: tathā hi candanacyavanādīnāṃ prathamaṃ snānakāryyatvenaiva pratītyā bādhānavatārāt /
GK16visa02cu:1508: atra ca vyañjanāyāḥ pravṛtternatu lakṣaṇāyā eva /
GK16visa02cu:1514: pūrvatra prathamaṃ bādhyatayā khyātau pratītau abhidhaiva tvityanena tatra lakṣaṇāyā abhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1518: (lo, i) eṣāṃ ca padārthānāṃ vāpīsnānaviruddhānāmanusandhānādeva vāpīsnānābhāvamātrasya
GK16visa02cu:1519: prarohābhāvena tadantikaṃ na gatāsītyatra viparītalakṣaṇayā gatāsīti lakṣyate ntumityataḥ
GK16visa02cu:1529: ataḥ saṃketasthānametaditi kayāpi saṃnihitaṃ pracchannakāmukaṃ pratyucyate /
GK16visa02cu:1533: (vi, ba) saṅketasthānamupanāyake darśayantyā dūtyā uktiriyam--ua iti /
GK16visa02cu:1540: tathā ca dyotyata ityatra dyotanaṃ sāmājikairvyañjanayā budhyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1541: nāyakena tu balākāpradarśanarūpāt vaktryā vailakṣaṇyāt saṅketasthalaṃ vyañjanayā budhyate /
GK16visa02cu:1565: guruparatantratayeti--dūrataradeśagataṃ patiṃ śocayantyā nāyikāyā uktiḥ prathamārddham /
GK16visa02cu:1567: naiṣyatīti---api tveṣyatyevetyarthaḥ kākkā vyajyate iti--kākkāḥ paraṃ nañarthopasthāpanānna eṣyati eṣyatyevetyevaṃrūpaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1575: (lo, ū) saṅketeti--hasatā vikaśatā netreṇa arpitamākūtamabhiprayoyena iti viṭaviśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa02cu:1580: atra saṃdhyā saṃketakāla iti paṅmanimīlanādiceṣṭayā kayāciddyotyate /
GK16visa02cu:1583: (vi, ma) saṃketakāleti---viṭaṃ dhūrttam upanāyakaṃ saṃketakālamanasaṃ tajjijñāsārthaṃ tanmanaskaṃ jñātvetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1584: hasatā netreṇārpitaṃ sthāpitam ākūtaṃ bhāvo yatra tādṛśaṃ yathā syāttathā līlāpadmaṃ nimīlitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1591: tatra vācyārthasya vyañjanā yathā-“kālo madhuḥ-” ityādi /
GK16visa02cu:1603: śabdārthayorekasya vyañjakatve taditaraḥ sahakārī satu avarjanīyasānnidhimātreṇāvasthitaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1604: kintu yatra yacchaktirutkaṭā tatra tanmūlo vyañjakatvavyapadeśaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1624: tātparyārthaṃ tadarthaṃ ca vākyaṃ tadvodhakaṃ pare // VisSd_2.20 //
GK16visa02cu:1627: (vi, ra) na kevalaṃ vācyāditrividha eva śabdasyārtho 'pi tu vācyāditrayabhinnaḥ padārthasaṃsargo 'pi śabdārthastadbodhakaṃ ca vākyamityāha--kiṃ cetyādinā /
GK16visa02cu:1630: tadarthaṃ tasyā vṛtterviṣayarūpamarthaṃ tātparyyārthaṃ saṃsargarūpaṃ tadvodhakaṃ ca vākyamityāhuḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1632: abhidhāyā ekaikapadārthabodhanavirāmādvākyārtharūpasya padārthānvayasya bodhikā tātpaya nāma vṛttiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1637: (vi, la) abhidhāyāḥ saṃsargabodhane 'sāmarthyaṃ darśayan vyācaṣṭe--abhidhāyā iti /
GK16visa02cu:1639: abhihitānvayavādināṃ naiyāyikānāṃ padena padārthe 'bhihite smārite tadanvayabodho vākyādeva //
GK16visa02cu:1643: ihi sāhityārpaṇo vākyasvarūpanirūpaṇo nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
